Class PropertyLoader

java.lang.Object
main.java.util.resources.PropertyLoader
public class PropertyLoader extends Object

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static Properties load(String filepath, boolean forReview) throws PropertiesException, IOException
      Parses a .properties file content onto a Properties object.
      Parameters:
      file - path of the .properties file to load
      forReview - whether this loading is done in a temporary-review file
      Returns:
      Properties object containing the contents of the file
      Throws:
      IOException
      PropertiesException - if there is an error while loading properties from a given file (formatting/content errors inside file)

    • getProperties

      public static Properties getProperties(String values)
      Builds a properties object from a text that should have a Properties-like format.
      Parameters:
      values - texts to build key-value pairs with
      Returns:
      properties object containing replacement of property values for their translations

    • join

      public static Properties join(Properties p1, Properties p2)
      Merges 2 properties objects.
      Parameters:
      p1 - properties object 1
      p2 - properties object 2
      Returns:
      merged properties

    • getKeysText

      public static StringBuilder getKeysText(String targetLanguage, Properties props)
      From the texts given as results, build the .properties-like text to be written onto the file.
      Parameters:
      targetLanguage - : string specifying the target language of this translation
      text - : different translations returned by the translator
      Returns:
      succession of keys in the file

    • getValuesText

      public static StringBuilder getValuesText(String targetLanguage, Properties texts)
      From the texts given as results, build the .properties-like text to be written onto the file.
      Parameters:
      targetLanguage - : string specifying the target language of this translation
      text - : different translations returned by the translator
      properties - : properties object with key/vaue pairs
      Returns:
      complete text in the specific format
